deities.name: Helios
deities.domain: God of the Sun, driving its chariot through the sky

deities.name: Ouranus
deities.domain: The god of the Sky and The Heavens

deities.name: Poseidon
deities.domain: God of the sea, storms, earthquakes, and horses

deities.name: Nyx
deities.domain: Primordial goddess of the night and hellhounds

deities.name: Theia
deities.domain: The goddess of divine light, is the ether of bright blue sky

deities.name: Selene
deities.domain: Goddess and personification of the Moon

deities.name: Aphrodite
deities.domain: Goddess of love, lust, passion, pleasure, beauty, and sexuality
